Submodules¶

parameterized_mortgage.calculate module¶

Module provides parameterized functions for calculating data for mortgages.

class parameterized_mortgage.calculate.annual_summary(*args, **params)[source]¶

Bases: ParameterizedFunction

params(repayment_schedule=DataFrame, name=String) Return a year-by-year summary in a pd.DataFrame when passed a mortgage repayment schedule

in the format supplied by calcs.repayment_schedule().
